PyGHO
  • PyTorch Geometric High Order Documentation
  • Edit on GitHub

PyTorch Geometric High Order DocumentationÔÉÅ

PyTorch Geometric High Order (PyGHO) is a high order graph neural network (HOGNN) extension library for PyTorch Geometric. Unlike ordinary GNNs producing node representations, HOGNNs produce representations for node tuples. PyGHO is the first unified library for HOGNNs.

>@inproceedings{PyGHO,
                author = {Xiyuan Wang and Muhan Zhang},
                title = {{PyGHO, a Library for High Order Graph Neural Networks}},
                year = {2023},
}
